tatami.core.util.logging

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.util.logging.Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GElement, Graph, GraphMatcher, GraphRepresentation

    public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    The Unit class should be extended by any class using a log obtained from Log.

    It is characterized by the unitName, which also gives the name of (and helps refer) the log.

    On construction, the name can be the DEFAULT_UNIT_NAME, in which case the class id is used; null, in which case a log is not created; or another name that should be unique across the JVM.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
